titles.title: Pinnacles National Monument Boundary Adjustment Act of 1999
To expand the boundaries of Pinnacles National Monument, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Referred to Department of the Interior for comments.

bill.summary: 6/18/1999--Introduced. Pinnacles National Monument Boundary Adjustment Act of 1999 - Modifies the boundaries of the Pinnacles National Monument in California to include specified additional lands. Requires the Secretary of the Interior to transfer administrative jurisdiction over the added lands to the Director of the National Park Service.Designates the added lands as wilderness and as a component of the National Wilderness Preservation System.
